name: New Design! Studded Bow Flats
description:
Faux Leather exterior and sole. Inside lining is a black satin. 

**NON SLIP Faux Leather bottoms, can be used for all ages.

THESE SHOES ARE MADE TO ORDER. PROCESSING TIME FOR ALL SHOES IS 10-14 BUSINESS DAYS (M-F), PLUS SHIP TIME.

**RUSH ORDERS are available, Select option on page 2 of the products page. All non rushed shipments ship via USPS FIRST CLASS SERVICE. 


Size options are by approximate sizes only. To ensure a perfect fit, measure your child’s foot from heel to toe and add 1/2" for growth and wiggle room. Soft soled shoes tend to run smaller than firm soled shoes. Keep this in mind when choosing a size. If in doubt order the next size up. (Tolerance of -1/2 +1/2) PLS REVIEW THE SIZE SCALE

IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A BIGGER SIZE PLS EMAIL ME KEEPSAKEGOODS@GMAIL.COM


CAUTION:
Every embellishment is attached to the best of our ability so please use great caution while your little one is wearing our shoes.

Please visit our blog for product updates & New styles!

name: Gift Certificate
description:
*expires 6months after purchase

*Person using the gift certificate will email me the certificate # and items they wish to order. I will them process invoice accordingly thru my end.

Certificates over $50.00 will receive a complimentary "Everyday" Headband with there order. (Colors are selected at random for the free headband sent) The free headband will be sent together with the certificate.

Ships out within 1-2Business days

***if you are interested in buying a gift card over $100 pls email me at KEEPSAKEGOODS@GMAIL.COM

name: Rush Shipping Options
description:
All orders ship within 10-14 business days, Shipping cost begins @ $5.00 depending on items and city/state goods will be shipped to for the first item & .80cent for every additional. Charge automatically appears at check out no need to select these options if you are ok with this timeline. (these $5.00 as added to the Rush Cost you select)

**International customers please email us if you would like this option!

RUSH REQUEST - Options are subject to availability (if not available it will state that next to the option). Also these options are only based on no more then 2 items. If you have more then 3 items please email us first before processing your order, add your items to the email & specific need date.

Processing time does not include transit time. 

2-6days processing time rush service ships USPS Priority 

8-14days processing time ships Standard USPS First CLass

All orders ship within 10-14 business days, Shipping cost begins @ $5.00 depending on items and city/state goods will be shipped to.
